channel.title: Hmm, limiting ::yell usage?
channel.description:
Okay, it what I'm asking, is there a way you could add a timer in for, for the ::yell command?
This would slow down spam a bit and the amount of people that yell random things.
Expample -
Player - ::yell/ hi player - ::yell/ sorry you must wait 20 secs to yell again
-Thanks [btw I'm using Dodian if that'd effect anything.]

item.title: Hmm, limiting ::yell usage?
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

I feel dumb for not thinking of this. I guess I’m too tired to worry with it, I’m out for the night. I’ll get too work tomorrow night.

-Later

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm, limiting ::yell usage?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

if(yellTimer > 0){
sendMessage(“You must wait “+yellTimer+”.”);
return;
}

That would go in the yell command

Read full topic
